entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -19.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
